thread.title: Three Malaysians arrested with 45 kg gold at Bangladesh airport
thread.title_full: Three Malaysians arrested with 45 kg gold at Bangladesh airport | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: PTI
title: Three Malaysians arrested with 45 kg gold at Bangladesh airport
text:
Representational Image Three Malaysian nationals carrying 45 kg gold have been arrested by the Bangladeshi custom officials at the airport.
The three landed in Dhaka on Saturday on a Malaysian Airlines flight and during security search, 45 kg gold was recovered from them, said customs Assistant Commissioner Md Shahiduzzaman Sarkar.
"The estimated market value of the seized 45 kg gold is around Tk 270 million. The three Malaysians said that they were only carriers," the official was Quote: d as saying by the bdnews. The three were identified as Hi Buyee Khong, 38, Johari bin Harun, 41 and Mohammed Ajwan bin Salihin, 21.
